charges.charge_description: 21:841A=ND.F On or about July 31, 2014 in Midland County, in the Western District of Texas, defendant, aided and abetted by another, did possess with intent to distribute a quantity of "crack" cocaine in violation of Title 21, USC 841(a)(1) and Title 18, USC 2.
